# cornerRadius

**Instance Property**

The radius to use when drawing rounded corners for the cell.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var cornerRadius: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Modifying Cell Appearance

- **contentBleed**: The amount of content that bleeds into the masked portions of the cell.
- **maskAmount**: The amount of masking to apply to the cell.
